Text: This doesn't work.  Followed your instructions EXACTLY and when I get to the step to enter the LE serial, LE starts up and says "can't find hardware" or something like that and refuses to let me enter the serial.

saint_berzerker: Even if the serial is cracked, you still need the actual hardware for this to work - which is why it is provided in two versions. One for M-Audio hardware, and one for Digidesign hardware.
Is this version for m-audio soundcards or mac?

what actual hardware do i need to use this program? im looking into teaching myself how to use this software and was wondering what all do i need

Pro Tools requires investment in certain hardware components. There is a good list comparing the costs and requirements of various audio recording programs at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comparison_of_multitrack_recording_software

Pro Tools gets a lot of music press because of it's versatility, but it does require you to put a little something into it. Try FL Studio or Cakewalk SONAR for good recording software that doesn't require special hardware.
